LanguageData.Apparel_RoyalMarinesBeret.label: RMC贝雷帽
LanguageData.Apparel_RoyalMarinesBeret.description: 英国皇家海军陆战队使用的标志性绿色贝雷帽.
LanguageData.Apparel_BritishMK7HelmetNoGoggles.label: MK7头盔
LanguageData.Apparel_BritishMK7HelmetNoGoggles.descri: 基础型MK7头盔，只能抵御弹片.
LanguageData.Apparel_BritishMK7Helmet.label: MK7头盔（带护目镜）
LanguageData.Apparel_BritishMK7Helmet.description: 带护目镜的MK7头盔，只能抵御弹片.
LanguageData.Apparel_BritishMK7HelmetGhillie.label: MK7迷彩头盔
LanguageData.Apparel_BritishMK7HelmetGhillie.descript: 这是迷彩伪装版MK7头盔，至少没有人能看见你戴着MK7头盔.
LanguageData.Apparel_UKSFFASTHelmet.label: UKSF快速反应头盔
LanguageData.Apparel_UKSFFASTHelmet.description: 这是英国特种部队配备的快速反应头盔，头盔集成了前沿军用科技.
